title: Leaves from the journal of our life in the Highlands, from 1848 to 1861.
author: Victoria
snippet: We took post-horses at Castleton,and proceeded up Glen Chmie to Glen Callater,which looked lovely, and which Albert admiredmuch.

title: Leaves from the journal of our life in the Highlands, from 1848 to 1861 :
author: Victoria
snippet: We took post-horses at Castleton,and proceeded up Glen Clunie to Glen Callater,Cft  st]

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: The usual way is to go by the north side of the Cluny water, up Glen Callater, turning off to the left at the keeper's house at Loch Callater, by a very steep path.
